fields.name: Divine Wisdom (Charge 100%):
fields.value: Receive the list of all non-Mafia, non-Town roles present in the game.

fields.name: Counsel Strength (1x, Charge 75%):
fields.value: Increase your target's attack and defense powers by 0.2x tonight.

fields.name: Instill Virtue (2x):

fields.name: Admonish (1x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. Your target will have 3 extra votes placed against them the following day. This will only be revealed once voting ends.

fields.name: Confessional (Passive):
fields.value: You may request two Hello Neighbors each day phase.
